mbean.description: The ThreadPool manages all threads used by Resin.

attribute.name: ThreadMax
attribute.description: The maximum number of threads that Resin can allocate.

attribute.name: SpareThreadMin
attribute.description: The minimum number of threads Resin should have available for new requests or other tasks. This value causes a minimum number of idle threads, useful for situations where there is a sudden increase in the number of threads required.

attribute.name: ThreadCount
attribute.description: The current total number of threads managed by the pool.

attribute.name: ActiveThreadCount
attribute.description: The number of active threads. These threads are busy servicing requests or performing other tasks.

attribute.name: IdleThreadCount
attribute.description: The number of idle threads. These threads are allocated but inactive, available for new requests or tasks.

notification.name: com.caucho.server.resin.ThreadPool.max
notification.description: Notification sent when the maximum number of threads is hit.
